sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { MapPin, Clock, Heart, Phone } from 'lucide-react'; const WeddingInvitation = () => { const [confirmed, setConfirmed] = useState(false); const weddingDetails = { brideAndGroom: { bride: "Sarah Johnson", groom: "Michael Smith", date: "August 15, 2025" }, lyrics: "Love is patient, love is kind.\nIt does not envy, it does not boast,\nit is not proud.", ceremony: { time: "2:00 PM", location: "St. Patrick's Cathedral", address: "5th Avenue, New York, NY", mapsLink: "https://maps.google.com/?q=St+Patricks+Cathedral+NY" }, reception: { time: "6:00 PM", location: "The Plaza Hotel", address: "768 5th Ave, New York, NY", mapsLink: "https://maps.google.com/?q=The+Plaza+Hotel+NY" }, godparents: { bride: ["Jane & John Davis", "Mary & Robert Wilson"], groom: ["Elizabeth & James Brown", "Patricia & William Taylor"] }, rsvpPhone: "+1 (555) 123-4567" }; const Section = ({ children, className = "" }) => (
{children}
); return (
{/* Hero Section */}

{weddingDetails.brideAndGroom.bride} & {weddingDetails.brideAndGroom.groom}

{weddingDetails.brideAndGroom.date}

{/* Love Lyrics Section */}

{weddingDetails.lyrics}

{/* Ceremony Details Section */}

Ceremony Details

Godparents

Bride's Godparents

{weddingDetails.godparents.bride.map((pair, index) => (

{pair}

))}

Groom's Godparents

{weddingDetails.godparents.groom.map((pair, index) => (

{pair}

))}

Religious Ceremony

{weddingDetails.ceremony.time}

{weddingDetails.ceremony.location}

{weddingDetails.ceremony.address}

View on Google Maps

Reception

{weddingDetails.reception.time}

{weddingDetails.reception.location}

{weddingDetails.reception.address}

View on Google Maps
{/* RSVP Section */}

Confirmation

{weddingDetails.rsvpPhone}

); }; export default WeddingInvitation;
